How Grounded Works

Auto-Track Habits

Automatically track your travel methods and daily behaviors.

Earn Points

Get rewarded for sustainable choices that reduce emissions.

Use points to get rewards from partner brands.

Key Features

Flight Avoidance Bonus

Points per day grounded; points penalty per flight mile.

Car-Free Commuting

Points per km of active commute

Work From Home

Points per day for short commutes or WFH

Exercise Streaks

Points for 5-day streaks; 30-day streaks

Screen Time Reduction

Points per day reduced screen-time; monthly bonuses
